text:
You look down with disgust on the gory, bloated bodies of the corpses, now oozing a vile pus that stains the carpet hideously. On one of the dead hands you notice a RUBY RING.

One of the mirrors remains unbroken. There was no corpse behind this one, and when you go closer to inspect it you realise that it is actually a disguised secret door.

choices.text: Slide back the mirror and see what lies beyond
Continue to the end of the corridor and try the bronze double doors
